!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

 

Dear Accounts Department,

 

We have received the latest statement from your company, and we noticed that there are several invoices listed. Could you please provide us with copies of the following invoices that appear on the statement:

 

- Invoice Number: 1/1 3474636

- Invoice Date: 30/01/2025

 

- Invoice Number: 1/1 3474657

- Invoice Date: 30/01/2025

 

- Invoice Number: 1/1 3483139

- Invoice Date: 10/03/2025

 

 

We would appreciate it if you could send us the invoices at your earliest convenience so we can process them accordingly.

 

Thank you for your assistance, and please let us know if you need any further information from us.

 

Best regards,

 

Tsitsi Cherai



3 Mon Repos Building 

Newlands, Harare, Zimbabwe 

Tel: +263-4-788328/9 OR 776078
